summary: In a small Pennsylvanian town, Matthew has just taken over an old farm property in order to start his new car dealership. Unknown to him the farm is located on the site of a graveyard, which the local townsfolk claim should be left alone.
cast: Tom Savini|Marty Schiff|Damien Luvara|Jamie McCoy|Sam Nicotero|Heidi Hinzman|Philip Bower|Tom Stoviak|A. Barrett Worland|Jennifer Kazarian|Justin Krauss|Christopher Mowod|Christopher Maurer|Barret Hackney|Scott Kerschbaumer|Karen L. Wolf|Robert Oppel|John Yost|Larry Kozlowski|Daniel Sweazen|Macey Schiff|Sarah Terrill|Ryan Pryce|Dallion Elkins|Austin Jarboe|Matt Campbell|Thaddus Davis|Jack Fordyce|Adam Graff|Vincent J. Guastini|Jesse LeChok|Vincent Schicchi|Jason Sinagra|Jamie Stevenson|Jo Stevenson|Tornado Toth|Brad White|Jesse White|Olivian Ciummo|Joe Conty|April Dawson|Erin Dawson|Nicholas Diamantes|Chris Diespinosa|George Drennen|John Guzzetti|Karl Kozak|James Manley|Jenny Meehan|Mike Mozurak|Jean-Pierre Nutini|Joseph Rhodes|Shawn Rolly|Amy Schantz|Christian Stavrakis
director: Director: Tor Ramsey (as Tor A. Ramsey)
title: Los hijos de los muertos vivientes
